Title: Girard-Perregaux Mens Automatic White Gold Tourbillon Watch 9930
Description: Watches Jewelry Accessories About us Policies Girard-Perregaux Mens Automatic White Gold Tourbillon Watch 9930 (Click to Enlarge) Girard-Perregaux Mens Automatic White Gold Tourbillon Watch 9930 Condition: Certified Pre-Owned Brand: Certified Pre-Owned Reference: 9930 Also Known As: 9930 Web ID: 166767Stock Number: 2188803Case Size: mm Gender: Gents Movement: Automatic Bezel: 18K White Gold Functions: Hours, Minutes, Small seconds, Tourbillon Strap: Leather Clasp Type: Tang Included Items: Manufacturer's Box Power Reserve: 75 Hours Materials: 18K White Gold Finishing: 18K White Gold Case Back: Solid Dial Color: Silver Exuding sophistication, class and prestige with its elegant design codes, exquisite finishes and captivating tourbillon, this remarkable wristwatch from Girard Perregaux boasts all the essential characteristics of a refined high-end timepiece. The silver guilloché dial with Roman numerals displays hours and minutes via central blued hands and shows small seconds at six o'clock position where the spectacular tourbillon revolves in intriguing fashion. Beneath lies a self-winding mechanical movement with 75-hour power reserve, nested inside the 18K white gold case which is mounted onto a black leather strap secured on the wrist with a tang buckle.Please note that some watches are on memo from other dealers and do not carry a return policy, you will be notified before your purchase if the selected watch meets this criteria.
